name: Saddle Finance
description: Saddle is a decentralized automated market maker (AMM) on the Ethereum blockchain, optimized for trading pegged value crypto assets with minimal slippage. Saddle enables cheap, efficient, swift, and low-slippage swaps for traders and high-yield pools for LPs. We believe in collaboration, in building Saddle as a DeFi lego block, in helping DeFi teams bring AMMs to any blockchain.
